intro.0: "Conquer a town, and you'll have a kingdom..."
intro.1: "...conquer a kingdom, and you'll have an empire..."
intro.2: "...conquer yourself, and you'll have the world in your hands."

anger.1: Embrace your inner fire and may it fuel your desire to conquer what isn't.

calm.1: ...so that the calm could repair the broken and fill what emptied you...
calm.2: ...be proud of your achievement, you have finally conquered yourself.

disgust.1: Allow the repulsion to be the judge of everything that should not be.

fear.1: May the watchful eyes open a new world of possibilities.

happiness.1: Let the unending spark boost your evey step.

sadness.0: The SADNESS is who you also are...
sadness.1: Embrace the eternal sea and let it be the guide to your sail.

surprise.1: Allow the unexpected to impulse your climb.

enemies.2100.name: Whisp of Happiness
enemies.2100.img: A glowing, yellow spirit that radiates joy, though it strikes with sharp bursts of energy.
enemies.2101.name: Cheerling
enemies.2101.img: A small, bright creature with a perpetual smile, darting around energetically.
enemies.2102.name: Gleam Wraith
enemies.2102.img: A shimmering figure that spreads light and warmth, but delivers sharp, precise attacks.
enemies.2103.name: Jubilant Fox
enemies.2103.img: A swift, playful fox with a glowing tail, darting in and out of combat.
enemies.2104.name: Radiance Orb
enemies.2104.img: A floating sphere of light that pulses with bursts of joy-filled energy.
enemies.2105.name: Bliss Elemental
enemies.2105.img: A humanoid figure made of golden light, exuding an aura of happiness while striking swiftly.
enemies.2106.name: Sunlit Guardian
enemies.2106.img: A knight clad in shining gold armor, wielding a radiant sword and shield.
enemies.2107.name: Euphoria Monarch
enemies.2107.img: A regal figure surrounded by golden light, striking with overwhelming bursts of joy.
enemies.2108.name: Joyous Archon
enemies.2108.img: An angelic being with golden wings, raining down beams of light-filled power.
enemies.2109.name: Eternal Bliss
enemies.2109.img: A celestial entity embodying infinite happiness, overwhelming enemies with its radiant energy.
enemies.3100.name: Whisp of Surprise
enemies.3100.img: A shifting, multicolored spirit that moves unpredictably, catching opponents off guard.
enemies.3101.name: Blinkling
enemies.3101.img: A small creature that teleports rapidly, striking from unexpected angles.
enemies.3102.name: Shock Wraith
enemies.3102.img: A ghostly figure with wide eyes and a jarring, startling scream.
enemies.3103.name: Jumping Jack
enemies.3103.img: A spring-like creature that bounces unpredictably, delivering powerful strikes.
enemies.3104.name: Sudden Serpent
enemies.3104.img: A snake-like creature that bursts out of hiding places to attack.
enemies.3105.name: Flash Elemental
enemies.3105.img: A glowing entity that emits blinding light to disorient foes.
enemies.3106.name: Ambush Beast
enemies.3106.img: A chameleon-like predator that blends into its surroundings, striking when least expected.
enemies.3107.name: Chaos Jester
enemies.3107.img: A maniacal jester that uses unpredictable attacks to keep enemies guessing.
enemies.3108.name: Trickster King
enemies.3108.img: A cunning, shape-shifting entity with a wide arsenal of unexpected tricks.
enemies.3109.name: Eternal Surprise
enemies.3109.img: A being of pure unpredictability, capable of transforming and attacking in unimaginable ways.
enemies.4100.name: Whisp of Disgust
enemies.4100.img: A putrid green spirit emitting a foul-smelling mist as it floats.
enemies.4101.name: Sludge Crawler
enemies.4101.img: A slimy, multi-legged creature leaving trails of toxic residue.
enemies.4102.name: Rotting Wraith
enemies.4102.img: A decaying specter with oozing flesh and an aura of rot.
enemies.4103.name: Pus Hound
enemies.4103.img: A diseased canine with open sores and venomous bites.
enemies.4104.name: Bile Elemental
enemies.4104.img: A humanoid figure made of flowing bile, splashing corrosive liquid with every move.
enemies.4105.name: Filth Spider
enemies.4105.img: A massive spider covered in filth, capable of spewing toxic webs.
enemies.4106.name: Carrion Swarm
enemies.4106.img: A swarm of rotting insects moving as one entity, devouring everything in their path.
enemies.4107.name: Plague Monarch
enemies.4107.img: A grotesque humanoid figure covered in boils, spreading disease with each attack.
enemies.4108.name: Foul Tyrant
enemies.4108.img: A bloated, monstrous figure exhaling clouds of toxic gas.
enemies.4109.name: Eternal Decay
enemies.4109.img: The ultimate manifestation of rot and decay, a massive being dripping with corrosive sludge.
enemies.5100.name: Whisp of Anger
enemies.5100.img: A fiery, red-tinted spirit with erratic and aggressive movements, leaving a trail of sparks as it floats.
enemies.5101.name: Emberling
enemies.5101.img: A small flame-like creature with glowing eyes and a short temper, exploding when defeated.
enemies.5102.name: Ash Wraith
enemies.5102.img: A smoky figure with fiery hands, capable of hurling fireballs and disappearing into ashes momentarily.
enemies.5103.name: Blazing Hound
enemies.5103.img: A molten canine with lava dripping from its fangs, radiating intense heat.
enemies.5104.name: Inferno Sentinel
enemies.5104.img: A towering humanoid engulfed in flames, wielding a burning spear.
enemies.5105.name: Rage Beetle
enemies.5105.img: A giant, red-shelled insect with sharp pincers, charging relentlessly at its foes.
enemies.5106.name: Fury Elemental
enemies.5106.img: An elemental spirit made entirely of swirling flames and smoke, with an unpredictable attack pattern.
enemies.5107.name: Molten Titan
enemies.5107.img: A massive, lava-covered giant with a burning crown and destructive ground-shaking attacks.
enemies.5108.name: Burning Tyrant
enemies.5108.img: A fiery dragon-like creature with wings of flame, exhaling streams of molten fire.
enemies.5109.name: Eternal Inferno
enemies.5109.img: The embodiment of wrath, a colossal inferno with a humanoid form, constantly growing stronger the longer the battle lasts.
enemies.6100.name: Whisp of Sadness
enemies.6100.img: A teardrop-shaped spirit that drips water, radiating melancholy.
enemies.6101.name: Gloomling
enemies.6101.img: A small, shadowy figure with drooping features and a mournful cry.
enemies.6102.name: Mourn Wraith
enemies.6102.img: A ghostly figure cloaked in tattered robes, crying softly as it attacks.
enemies.6103.name: Weeping Tree
enemies.6103.img: A sorrowful tree spirit that sheds tears of acid, its branches drooping heavily.
enemies.6104.name: Melancholia
enemies.6104.img: A swirling mist of despair, whispering tales of sadness to weaken resolve.
enemies.6105.name: Doom Crow
enemies.6105.img: A blackbird with glowing blue eyes, emitting sorrowful cries that lower morale.
enemies.6106.name: Tearborn Golem
enemies.6106.img: A golem made of damp, crumbling stone, strengthened by its own sorrowful energy.
enemies.6107.name: Grief Colossus
enemies.6107.img: A massive, weeping statue with heavy, earth-shaking attacks fueled by despair.
enemies.6108.name: Lament Sovereign
enemies.6108.img: A spectral king draped in shadows, commanding waves of sorrow to sap enemy strength.
enemies.6109.name: Eternal Woe
enemies.6109.img: A divine figure embodying ultimate sadness, surrounded by a storm of tears and sorrow.
enemies.7100.name: Whisp of Fear
enemies.7100.img: A shadowy, flickering spirit that emits unsettling whispers and darting movements.
enemies.7101.name: Phantom Stalker
enemies.7101.img: A translucent humanoid figure with piercing red eyes, vanishing and reappearing at will.
enemies.7102.name: Horror Wraith
enemies.7102.img: A ghastly specter with twisted limbs and a hollow, terrifying wail.
enemies.7103.name: Nightmare Wolf
enemies.7103.img: A large, black wolf with glowing eyes and an aura that instills paralyzing fear.
enemies.7104.name: Cursed Mirror
enemies.7104.img: A floating, cracked mirror that shows the viewer their worst fears, draining their resolve.
enemies.7105.name: Terror Spinner
enemies.7105.img: A spider-like creature that weaves webs infused with terrifying visions.
enemies.7106.name: Abyssal Shade
enemies.7106.img: A shadowy entity that grows stronger in the darkness, striking with cold, clawed hands.
enemies.7107.name: Lord of Shadows
enemies.7107.img: A towering, shadowy humanoid with tendrils of darkness extending from its body.
enemies.7108.name: Eternal Night
enemies.7108.img: An ancient, ghostly figure surrounded by a swirling black fog that consumes light.
enemies.7109.name: The Abyss
enemies.7109.img: The physical embodiment of fear itself, a massive, ever-changing form that induces terror simply by existing.
enemies.8100.name: Whisp of Calm
enemies.8100.img: A soft, blue-green spirit with a soothing aura, floating serenely but striking when provoked.
enemies.8101.name: Serenity Sprite
enemies.8101.img: A small, glowing fairy-like creature with delicate wings and a calming presence.
enemies.8102.name: Tranquil Wisp
enemies.8102.img: A semi-transparent figure with flowing robes, spreading a mist that slows opponents.
enemies.8103.name: Zen Turtle
enemies.8103.img: A large, slow-moving turtle with a shell covered in moss, capable of reflecting damage.
enemies.8104.name: Lullaby Willow
enemies.8104.img: A graceful tree spirit with flowing branches that cast sleep-inducing spores.
enemies.8105.name: Meditation Orb
enemies.8105.img: A glowing, hovering orb that pulses with calm energy, emitting waves to weaken aggression.
enemies.8106.name: Peacebound Guardian
enemies.8106.img: A serene knight clad in silver armor, wielding a shield that absorbs hostile energy.
enemies.8107.name: Harmony Sentinel
enemies.8107.img: A towering construct of glowing stone, radiating an aura that slows and weakens aggressors.
enemies.8108.name: Elder Sage
enemies.8108.img: An ancient robed figure who speaks in riddles, using powerful defensive spells to outlast opponents.
enemies.8109.img: A deity-like entity made of pure light, balancing immense power with peaceful resolve.
